title: Update email address from mukesh@example.com to mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com

requirements.text: Replace all instances of 'mukesh@example.com' with 'mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com' in the Contact component (frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx), including displayed contact information and any form placeholder text
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of 'mukesh@example.com' are replaced with 'mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com'
Email display in contact information section shows 'mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com'
Email input field placeholder (if present) shows 'mukeshhkumarr16@gmail.com'
No references to 'mukesh@example.com' remain in the Contact component

nonGoals: Changing phone numbers or other contact information
